title: Which font
content:
I dont have the notes from the original developer so could anyone tell what font this is ?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821052747im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_6348.png)
author: smallzoo

comments.content: It’s a small sample, but this might be [taz Extra Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821052747/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/lucasfonts/taz_iii_extra_bold_extra_bold_italic/ot_ps?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=90&sample_text=my%20account&ft=liga) by Luc(as) de Groot.
